class.name: Armory

a blazing iron cuirass (excellent)..It glows softly

alias.name: armor
show_armor

@held_1 #echo Shield: @shield_1 #echo Face: @face_1 #echo Skirt: @skirt_1 } #if (%1 = "2") { #echo "" #echo "Armor Config: 2" #echo Light: @light_2 #echo Ring1: @ring1_2 #echo Ring2: @ring2_2 #echo alias.name: clear_armor
